bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. Pathological Mechanism identical with qi zhi 氣滯 , qi sluggishness. Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 Substance Entry suo cao gen 莎草 根：心中客熱，膀胱間連脅下氣妨，常日憂愁不樂 , “There is visitor heat in the heart, and there is a qi impediment in the bladder connecting with the region below the flanks. [Patients] are worried all the time and cannot be happy”. Qi feng 臍風 , navel wind [27]

Alternative Names xiao er zhong feng 小兒中風 , children struck by wind; qiang bao zhong feng 襁褓中風 , struck by wind in the swaddling cloth; rao qi feng 繞臍風 , wind encircling the navel. Pathological Condition of po shang feng 破傷風， wound wind, brought forth by wind evil affecting the navel region of newborn children. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 8: 小兒臍風、大人涼濕，得痙 風者皆死 , “If small children with navel wind or adults with cold moisture are, in addition, affected by spasms wind, they all die”.
